item.title: Kitty
item.description: PSA Adopt, don't shop! PS: catnip is awesome

item.title: Reticulate
item.description: For someone like me with little experience in computer coding, R was an easy program to transition into for manipulating, visualizing, and analyzing data. However, when Dr. Woodward started teaching Python, it was a foreign language to me, full of news things I had yet to learn. Why couldn't you simply have a file "copy to" a different location? Instead, the file has to be saved, then reuploaded in the desired location (so unnecessarily complicated).
